attributes.action: We Want the Government to STOP outside influences such as George Soros
attributes.background:
George soros is trying to influence our political and democratic votes.
We voted to leave the EU and yet this man who caused  black Wednesday to profit from  . We want parliment to Stop outside influences like soros  and his money trying to overturn Brexit

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

If you want the UK Government and Parliament to change the law to stop non-UK residents donating money to UK political lobby groups, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/212268

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
